name: Vote Chatbot
description: Vote on topics in Zoom Chat

client_id.description: Your Zoom Production Client ID, found on your Zoom App Credentials page

client_secret.description: Your Zoom Production Client Secret, found on your Zoom App Credentials page

bot_jid.description: Your Zoom Production Bot JID, found on your Zoom Features page

slash_command.description: Your Zoom Slash Command, found on your Zoom Features page

verification_token.description: Your Zoom Verification Token, found on your Zoom Features page

verification_code.description: Optional, Your Zoom domain verification code, used to verify your domain name, found on your Zoom Submit page
